<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Augment Summoning](/Spells.aspx?ID=521)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 406 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature you summoned
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You augment the abilities of a summoned creature. The target gains a +1 status bonus to all checks (this also applies to the creature's DCs, including its AC) for the duration of its summoning, up to 1 minute.
